fields.name: created_at
fields.description: Row creation timestamp (warehouse)

fields.name: updated_at
fields.description: Last update timestamp (warehouse)

fields.name: record_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for this trip update record

fields.name: entity_id
fields.description: GTFS-RT entity identifier for this trip update

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Timestamp when this trip update was recorded

fields.name: timestamp_s
fields.description: Unix timestamp in seconds

fields.name: route_id
fields.description: Route identifier this trip belongs to

fields.name: trip_id
fields.description: Trip identifier this update applies to

fields.name: start_date
fields.description: Start date of the trip in YYYYMMDD format

fields.name: start_time
fields.description: Scheduled start time of the trip

fields.name: direction_id
fields.description: Direction of travel (0 or 1)

fields.name: schedule_relationship
fields.description: Relationship to the scheduled trip

fields.name: delay
fields.description: Delay in seconds from scheduled time

fields.name: stop_sequence
fields.description: Sequence number of the stop in the trip

fields.name: stop_id
fields.description: Stop identifier this update applies to

fields.name: actual_arrival
fields.description: Actual arrival time at the stop (UTC)

fields.name: actual_arrival_s
fields.description: Actual arrival time in Unix seconds

fields.name: arrival_delay
fields.description: Arrival delay in seconds

fields.name: arrival_uncertainty
fields.description: Uncertainty of arrival time in seconds

fields.name: actual_departure
fields.description: Actual departure time from the stop (UTC)

fields.name: actual_departure_s
fields.description: Actual departure time in Unix seconds

fields.name: departure_delay
fields.description: Departure delay in seconds

fields.name: departure_uncertainty
fields.description: Uncertainty of departure time in seconds

fields.name: vehicle_id
fields.description: Vehicle identifier serving this trip

fields.name: vehicle_label
fields.description: User-visible vehicle label

fields.name: vehicle_license_plate
fields.description: Vehicle license plate number

description: Real-time trip update data from GTFS-RT feeds
